alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 10:38PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gillespie and southwestern Llano Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1038 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cherry Spring, or 13 miles north of Fredericksburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Stonewall, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Eckert, Crabapple, Willow City and Cherry Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
